Class Neuron

java.lang.Object
Neuron
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPropagable
public class Neuron extends Object implements IPropagable
Represents a neuron in a neural network.

      Specified by:

      Parameters:

      connWeight - the connection weight

    • ghostpropagate

      public void ghostpropagate()
      Description copied from interface: IPropagable
      performs a forward propagation. !!!does not cache results for backpropagation!!!
      Specified by:
      ghostpropagate in interface IPropagable

    • backpropagate

      public void backpropagate(Matrix deltas, double learningRate, int numOutputs)
      Description copied from interface: IPropagable
      performs a backpropagation. resets caches automatically.
      Specified by:
      backpropagate in interface IPropagable
      Parameters:
      deltas - the deltas from the calling node (error term)
      learningRate - the learning rate
      numOutputs - number of output nodes in the graph

    • isOutputNeuron

      public boolean isOutputNeuron()
      Returns:
      true if the neuron is an output neuron.

    • resetCaches

      public void resetCaches()
      Description copied from interface: IPropagable
      propagates forward through the network, clearing caches.
      Specified by:
      resetCaches in interface IPropagable

    • getError

      public double getError(Matrix targetOutput, boolean isGhost)
      the error function (MSE) of the current neuron.
      Parameters:
      targetOutput - the target values for this output node.
      isGhost - if the error is to be calculated to the ghost output or the normal one.
      Returns:
      the error function (MSE)

    • weights

      public Matrix weights()
      Description copied from interface: IPropagable
      first index (0) is the bias
      Specified by:

      Returns:

      Description copied from interface: IPropagable

      Specified by:
